wavemedia.graphic

Class GraphicHandlerObject.GraphicBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • wavemedia.graphic.GraphicHandlerObject.GraphicBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    GraphicHandlerObject

    public static class GraphicHandlerObject.GraphicBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for all graphics objects.
    Version:
    0.2 10/03/2015
    Author:
    tjd511

      • GraphicHandlerObject.GraphicBuilder

        public GraphicHandlerObject.GraphicBuilder(GraphicType graphic,
                                   float xStartPos,
                                   float yStartPos)
        Constructor for GraphicBuilder takes the 3 required values for each shape.
        Parameters:
        graphic - an enum of type GraphicsType that contains the type of shape being described.
        xStartPos - the x coordinate of the top left position of the shape.
        yStartPos - the y coordinate of the top left position of the shape.

      • shadow

        public GraphicHandlerObject.GraphicBuilder shadow(java.lang.String shadow)
        Method sets the amount of shadow to be applied to each shape.
        Parameters:
        shadow - a string containing the amount of shadow. Options: None, Light, Normal, Heavy. Case insensitive.

      • shadingType

        public GraphicHandlerObject.GraphicBuilder shadingType(java.lang.String shadingType)
        Method sets the type of shading to be applied to the shape.
        Parameters:
        shadingType - a string containing the type of shading to be applied to the shape. Options: None, Cyclic, Horizontal, Vertical. Case insensitive.

      • shadingElement

        public GraphicHandlerObject.GraphicBuilder shadingElement(java.lang.String shadingColor,
                                                 float offset)
        Method sets one of the shading values for the shape.
        Parameters:
        shadingColor - a #, followed by a 8 bit hex string of format ARGB
        offset - the relative distance through the shape that the color should appear.
        See Also:
        graphicsHandler.Shading}

      • build

        public GraphicHandlerObject build()
        Method builds the graphics object. Defaults: Color: "#ff000000". Outline color: "#00000000". Outline thickness: 1. Shading: Shading.NONE. Shadow: Shadow.NONE.
        Returns:
        a graphics object containing all the paramaters about the graphic.
